definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: BELLISARIO: To be honest, what's changed for me is my schedule.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，变化最多的是我的日程表。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth , your father was right when he said that you undersold the company.
sentences.chinese: 老实告诉你，你父亲对你低价抛售公司的判断是对的。

sentences.english: So why is the humble chair being blacklisted?
sentences.chinese: 但为什么这次是“老实巴交”的椅子被列入黑名单呢？

sentences.english: I do not like to boast of my own child, but to be sure, Jane -- one does not often see any body better looking.
sentences.chinese: 我并不喜欢夸张自己的孩子，可是说老实话。

sentences.english: But – honestly – he was trickier than most.
sentences.chinese: 但老实说，他比大多数人都调皮。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, when I have trouble, I always ask her for advice.
sentences.chinese: 跟你说老实话，每当我有麻烦时总向她征求意见。

sentences.english: We take him to be an honest man.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为他是个老实人。

sentences.english: They paid their taxes, why can’t they get all their promised benefits?
sentences.chinese: 他们老实纳税，为什么不能得到许诺给他们的福利？

sentences.english: Honestly, this is easier than I expected, though the frequency of archaic and rare words is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，异体字和生僻字出现的频率比我的预期高。

sentences.english: He is so honest that he will not accept bribe.
His friends pressed him for the truth about his relationship with Yvonne.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友逼他老实说出跟伊芳的关系。

sentences.english: But then again, I have had a hard time understanding the G. O. P. for a while now.
sentences.chinese: 不过，老实说，我早已不明白共和党究竟在干什么。

sentences.english: Now be honest with me, how many of you noticed?
sentences.chinese: 现在老实回答我的问题，你注意到多少呢？

sentences.english: Let's be honest, the lip-sucking kiss is the best.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，吸吮式的接吻是最棒的。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, dad, I never drink spirit even if I am from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 爹地，说老实话，虽然是东北人，可我从来不喝白酒。

sentences.english: Ann: Honestly, there are so many beggars who are pretended to cheat the passerby.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，很多乞丐都是假装的，以此来骗路人的钱。

definition: content with one's lot/knowing one's place
to do what one is told/obedient
to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place
(of a child) well-behaved/obediently/(term of endearment for a child) darling/sweetie
